Launch a rescue mission - don't forget snacks.
Step 5: Launch a rescue mission - forgets snacks

Step 6 - build a rescue mission for the rescue mission, and launch it into space and get to Duna only to realize you're out of electricity with no solar panels.

Step 8 - return to KSP after a month of being bored with it and launch the rescue mission with the craft you built a month ago. Get it all the way to Duna but realize you forgot the solar panels again.

Step 9: repeat steps 7-8.
Keep the new steps coming.
Game-type thread moved to the game-type subforum. Carry on.
